taste. The creation of
beauty is art.” – Ralph Waldo Emerson

Be Beautified

In our inviting sun-drenched space we as artists at Soncy push ourselves to be creative, relevant and joy-filled with the privilege of serving you.

Color change? Ombre? Consider a Complimentary Consultation to set a plan and timing for your best result.

Be Cut

Starting at:

  • Women $45+
  • We offer one complimentary bang trim between cuts
  • Men $30+

Be Styled

Starting at:

  • Blow-out $35+
  • w/ flat iron or curling iron to change texture $10+
  • Up-do $70+
  • Extensions Upon consultation

Be Smoothed

Starting at:

  • Keratin Express $150.
  • Keratin $250.

Complimentary consultation before scheduling is preferred

Be Conditioned

Starting at:

  • Oribe in-salon treatment $35.

Be Colored

Starting at:

  • Base Coverage $60+
  • Full Coverage $85+
  • Partial Foil $80+
  • Full Foil $100+
  • Gloss $30+
  • Basebreak $30+
  • Ombre Upon consultation
  • Baliage Upon consultation
  • Corrective Color Upon consultation

Be Married

 

  • Weddings Upon consultation
  • Make-up Upon consultation

Service price is dependent on the level of hairdresser skill and experience. Prices are subject to adjustment annually. We offer complimentary consultations.
